__platform__comment: The hardware platform used for this operation (e.g., CW308_STM32F4)
__target__comment: The specific target profile or algorithm being used (e.g., AES, ASCON, KECCAK)
__key_length__comment: The length of the encryption key in bits (e.g., 128, 192, 256)
__plaintext_length__comment: The length of the plaintext input in bytes (e.g., 64 bytes)
__use_iv__comment: Boolean value indicating whether an initialization vector (IV) is used; false for ECB mode, true otherwise
__masked__comment: Boolean value indicating whether masking is enabled for side-channel resistance (true if masked, false otherwise)
